messages.text:
Hello ken2 (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

lgtm

note - this will make all .6 files obsolete.
also, i couldnt verify all of the asm formats.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5d8b7f5742a5 ***

cmd/8l: add SSE2 instructions

R=ken
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6610065

On Sun, Oct 7, 2012 at 4:44 PM,  <ken@google.com> wrote:
>
> lgtm
>
> note - this will make all .6 files obsolete.
> also, i couldnt verify all of the asm formats.

yep. copied from 6l and they've been working okay.

i added the current go version string to the object header
at some point, and the linker requires the current version,
so stale objects are always rejected, even if they might
otherwise be fine. better safe than sorry, and it gives us
flexibility to do things like this.

russ

subject: code review 6610065: cmd/8l: add SSE2 instructions
